verses.verse: Now the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> when they had <S%H7126>approached<s%> the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H4191>died.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H1696>"Tell<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> that he shall not <S%H935>enter<s%> at <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%> into the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place <S%H4480>inside<s%> <S%H1004><s%> the <S%H6532>veil,<s%> <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> <S%H3727>seat<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is on the <S%H727>ark,<s%> <S%H3808>lest<s%> he <S%H4191>die;<s%> for I will <S%H7200>appear<s%> in the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> <S%H3727>seat.<s%>

<S%H175>"Aaron<s%> shall <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place with <S%H2088>this:<s%> with a <S%H6499>bull<s%> <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1241><s%> for a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering.<s%>

"He shall <S%H3847>put<s%> on the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H3801>tunic,<s%> and the <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H4370>undergarments<s%> shall be <S%H5921>next<s%> to his <S%H1320>body,<s%> and he shall be <S%H2296>girded<s%> with the <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H73>sash,<s%> and <S%H6801>attired<s%> with the <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H4701>turban<s%> <S%H1992>(these<s%> are <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%>). Then he shall <S%H7364>bathe<s%> his <S%H1320>body<s%> in <S%H4325>water<s%> and <S%H3847>put<s%> them on.

"And he shall <S%H3947>take<s%> from the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8163>male<s%> <S%H5795>goats<s%> for a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering.<s%>

"Then <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> the <S%H6499>bull<s%> for the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is for himself, that he may <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for himself and for his <S%H1004>household.<s%>

"And he shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8163>goats<s%> and <S%H5975>present<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> at the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting.<s%>

"And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H5414>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%> for the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8163>goats,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> for the <S%H5799>scapegoat.<s%>

"Then <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> the <S%H5795>goat<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H1486>lot<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5927>fell,<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> it a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering.<s%>

"But the <S%H5795>goat<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H1486>lot<s%> for the <S%H5799>scapegoat<s%> <S%H5927>fell,<s%> shall be <S%H5975>presented<s%> <S%H2416>alive<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> to <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> upon it, to <S%H7971>send<s%> it into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> as the <S%H5799>scapegoat.<s%>

"Then <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> the <S%H6499>bull<s%> of the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is for himself, and <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for himself and for his <S%H1004>household,<s%> and he shall <S%H7819>slaughter<s%> the <S%H6499>bull<s%> of the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is for himself.

"And he shall <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H4289>firepan<s%> <S%H4393>full<s%> of <S%H1513>coals<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> from upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and two <S%H4393>handfuls<s%> <S%H2651><s%> of <S%H1851>finely<s%> <S%H1851>ground<s%> <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H7004>incense,<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> [it] <S%H4480>inside<s%> <S%H1004><s%> the <S%H6532>veil.<s%>

"And he shall <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H7004>incense<s%> on the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> that the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> of <S%H7004>incense<s%> may <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> <S%H3727>seat<s%> that is on [the ark of] the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> <S%H3808>lest<s%> he <S%H4191>die.<s%>

"Moreover, he shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H6499>bull<s%> and <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> [it] with his <S%H676>finger<s%> on the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> <S%H3727>seat<s%> on the <S%H9506>east<s%> [side]; also in <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> <S%H3727>seat<s%> he shall <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> with his <S%H676>finger<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times.<s%>

"Then he shall <S%H7819>slaughter<s%> the <S%H5795>goat<s%> of the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is for the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> its <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H413>inside<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1004><s%> the <S%H6532>veil,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> with its <S%H1818>blood<s%> as he <S%H6213>did<s%> with the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H6499>bull,<s%> and <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> it on the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> <S%H3727>seat<s%> and in <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> <S%H3727>seat.<s%>

"And he shall <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place, <S%H4480>because<s%> of the <S%H2932>impurities<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H4480>because<s%> of their <S%H6588>transgressions,<s%> in regard to <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H9128>sins;<s%> and <S%H3651>thus<s%> he shall <S%H6213>do<s%> for the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> which <S%H7931>abides<s%> with them in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of their <S%H2932>impurities.<s%>

"When he <S%H935>goes<s%> in to <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place, <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H120>one<s%> shall be in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he <S%H3318>comes<s%> out, that he may <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for himself and for his <S%H1004>household<s%> and for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

"Then he shall <S%H3318>go<s%> out to the <S%H4196>altar<s%> that is <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for it, and shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H6499>bull<s%> and of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H5795>goat,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> it on the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> on <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>sides.<s%>

"And with his <S%H676>finger<s%> he shall <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> on it <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times,<s%> and <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> it, and from the <S%H2932>impurities<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6942>consecrate<s%> it.

"When he <S%H3615>finishes<s%> <S%H3722>atoning<s%> for the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place, and the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> the <S%H2416>live<s%> <S%H5795>goat.<s%>

"Then <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H2416>live<s%> <S%H5795>goat,<s%> and <S%H3034>confess<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> it <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> in regard to <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H9128>sins;<s%> and he shall <S%H5414>lay<s%> them on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H5795>goat<s%> and <S%H7971>send<s%> [it] <S%H7971>away<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of a <S%H376>man<s%> who [stands] in <S%H6261>readiness.<s%>

"And the <S%H5795>goat<s%> shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> on itself <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> to a <S%H1509>solitary<s%> <S%H776>land;<s%> and he shall <S%H7971>release<s%> the <S%H8163>goat<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

"Then <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> and <S%H6584>take<s%> <S%H6584>off<s%> the <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H3847>put<s%> on when he <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place, and shall <S%H5117>leave<s%> them <S%H8033>there.<s%>

"And he shall <S%H7364>bathe<s%> his <S%H1320>body<s%> with <S%H4325>water<s%> in a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> and <S%H3847>put<s%> on his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H3318>come<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> and <S%H6213>offer<s%> his <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> and the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for himself and for the <S%H5971>people.<s%>
"Then he shall <S%H6999>offer<s%> up in <S%H6999>smoke<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

"And the one who <S%H7971>released<s%> the <S%H8163>goat<s%> as the <S%H5799>scapegoat<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%> and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> his <S%H1320>body<s%> with <S%H4325>water;<s%> then <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H3651><s%> he shall <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

"But the <S%H6499>bull<s%> of the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> and the <S%H8163>goat<s%> of the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> was <S%H935>brought<s%> in to <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place, shall be <S%H3318>taken<s%> <S%H413>outside<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and they shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> their <S%H5785>hides,<s%> their <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and their <S%H6569>refuse<s%> in the <S%H784>fire.<s%>

"Then the one who <S%H8313>burns<s%> them shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%> and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> his <S%H1320>body<s%> with <S%H4325>water,<s%> then <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H3651><s%> he shall <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

"And [this] shall be a <S%H5769>permanent<s%> <S%H2708>statute<s%> for you: in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> on the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> you shall <S%H6031>humble<s%> your <S%H5315>souls,<s%> and not <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H4399>work,<s%> whether the <S%H249>native,<s%> or the <S%H1616>alien<s%> who <S%H1481>sojourns<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> you;

for it is on <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H3722>atonement<s%> shall be <S%H3722>made<s%> for you to <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> you; you shall be <S%H2891>clean<s%> from <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H9128>sins<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
"It is to be a <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> of <S%H7677>solemn<s%> <S%H7677>rest<s%> for you, that you may <S%H6031>humble<s%> your <S%H5315>souls;<s%> it is a <S%H5769>permanent<s%> <S%H2708>statute.<s%>

"So the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> is <S%H4886>anointed<s%> and <S%H4390>ordained<s%> <S%H3027><s%> to <S%H3547>serve<s%> as <S%H3547>priest<s%> in his father's <S%H8478>place<s%> shall <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement:<s%> he shall thus <S%H3847>put<s%> on the <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H899>garments,<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments,<s%>

and <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4720>sanctuary;<s%> and he shall <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> and for the <S%H4196>altar.<s%> He shall also <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H6951>assembly.<s%>

"Now you shall <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> as a <S%H5769>permanent<s%> <S%H2708>statute,<s%> to <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H9128>sins<s%> <S%H259>once<s%> every <S%H8141>year.<s%>" And <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> [so] he <S%H6213>did.<s%>
